short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension for casually learning a language's vocabulary by incorporating it here and there in your browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Discover a fun and engaging way to learn a new language with Casually Bilingual! This innovative Chrome extension allows you to gradually immerse yourself in a foreign language by converting a configurable percentage of any webpage into your chosen language.

With Casually Bilingual, you can customize your learning experience by selecting the percentage of text to be translated and the target language. As you browse the web, the extension works seamlessly to transform parts of the content, helping you learn and practice a new language in context.

Key Features:
- Choose from a variety of languages to learn
- Adjust the percentage of translated content to suit your learning level
- Enjoy a non-intrusive, customizable language learning experience
- Learn new vocabulary and grammar while browsing your favorite websites

Start your language learning journey today and become Casually Bilingual!
